Container.Name: sickgear
Container.Overview:
SickGear(https://github.com/sickgear/sickgear) provides management of TV shows and/or Anime, it detects new episodes, links downloader apps, and more..
For more information on SickGear visit their website and check it out: https://github.com/SickGear/SickGear
Container.Changes:
### 2022-09-19 - Rebase to alpine 3.15. Build unrar from source.
### 2021-01-31 - Add unrar.
### 2021-01-29 - Deprecate `UMASK_SET` in favor of UMASK in baseimage, see above for more information.
### 2021-01-23 - Rebasing to alpine 3.13.
### 2020-06-03 - Rebasing to alpine 3.12, switch to python3.
### 2019-12-19 - Rebasing to alpine 3.11.
### 2019-06-28 - Rebasing to alpine 3.10.
### 2019-03-23 - Switching to new Base images, shift to arm32v7 tag.
### 2019-02-22 - Rebasing to alpine 3.9.
### 2018-11-07 - Pipeline prep
### 2018-07-07 - Initial draft release

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: will map the container's port 8081 to port 8081 on the host

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: this will store any uploaded data on the docker host

Config.Name: Path: /tv
Config.Description: where you store your tv shows

Config.Name: Path: /downloads
Config.Description: your downloads folder for post processing (must not be download in progress)
